data.text:
The centre of our salvation is the message of resurrection that christ Jesus died and the third day was resurrected.
#TheGlorifiedChurch https://t.co/9HArFRTZSf

The message of resurrection of the dead is the only true gospel of hope to the church.
#TheGlorifiedChurch

Without the message of ressurection, we don't have eternal life and those who have died are lost forever.
#TheGlorifiedChurch

The message of resurrection is hope to this dying world.
#TheGlorifiedChurch

The message of resurrection will disconnect us from the things of the world.
#TheGlorifiedChurch

Ressurection is the demonstration of the diety of our Lord Jesus Christ.
#TheGlorifiedChurch
It's only by the power of the power of  blood of Jesus who does and resurrected the cripples walk. #TheGlorifiedChurch https://t.co/Qfc7qSsj8O

The message of restriction is the centre of the holy gospel of Jesus Christ.
#TheGlorifiedChurch https://t.co/DdcmCVDb6K

The devil is busy helping the present-day church that has rejected the message of Ressurection to preach prosperity.
#TheGlorifiedChurch.
